name: Adventure Dodge
description:
Drive your unstoppable green cube through the perils of life in this colorfully musical level-based runner.

Visit the hubworld to travel through portals and discover new challenges. Find the star hidden in every level then return to the hubworld to unlock secrets and new areas. Can you find them all?

Created largely in one man's free-time, Adventure Dodge has no ads and is free to download. "We're not really trying to make money, we just want to create art and enable positive experiences in the world. Every level has a unique song which really gave Jackson an outlet for his passion to write music."

The OST for the game is for sale on bandcamp https://porchlightgames.bandcamp.com/releases

There are many things to do in Adventure Dodge including:

- Dodge obstacles!

- Unlock secrets!

- Original soundtrack!

- Discover true love!

- Make new friends!
- No ads!

- Explore new places!

- Collect the stars!
- Travel through space-time!

- Bounce around!
- Explode into pieces!
- Knock things over!
- Press buttons!
- Make decisions!
- Defeat a boss!
- And more!

[About Us]

Porchlight Games is a small team of passionate game developers based out of Dayton, Ohio.

We started during the summer of 2019. Ever since childhood, video games helped connect us to the world, and now we want to add our story. The games we create are developed in our free time outside of day jobs and class, and are made with an open mind and direction that comes from within. We make the kind of games that we want to play.

Our dream is to one day make a living sharing stories and unique experiences we create with everyone. We want to make the world a weirder place.
